meanings.definition: A person who rows a boat using oars.
meanings.sent1: The skilled oarsmen smoothly rowed the boat across the lake.
meanings.sent2: The team of oarsmen worked together to navigate the river.
meanings.sent3: The oarsmen decided to have a race to see who could row the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of life, we are all oarsmen, navigating our own paths.
meanings.sent5: The oarsmen's synchronized rowing was a beautiful sight to behold.
